titles.title: Streamlining DHS Overhead Act
Streamlining DHS Overhead Act
Streamlining DHS Overhead Act
Streamlining DHS Overhead Act
Streamlining DHS Overhead Act

To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to direct the Under Secretary for Management of the Department of Homeland Security to make certain improvements in managing the Department's real property portfolio, and for other purposes.
Streamlining DHS Overhead Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Homeland Security. H. Rept. 115-184.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 125.

action.text: Mr. Rutherford moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2190.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
